name: CodeValidatorTest
description: Unit tests for the CodeValidator class, focusing on check digit validation, regular expressions, and length constraints.

test_cases.name: testCheckDigit
test_cases.description: Tests the check digit functionality of the CodeValidator, including scenarios with no check digit and using the EAN-13 check digit routine.

test_cases.name: testConstructors
test_cases.description: Tests the various constructors of the CodeValidator class to ensure proper initialization of regex validator, min/max length, and check digit.

test_cases.name: testLength
test_cases.description: Tests the minimum and maximum length constraints of the CodeValidator, ensuring that strings outside the specified length range are invalidated.

test_cases.name: testNoInput
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the CodeValidator when handling null, zero-length, and whitespace-only input strings.

test_cases.name: testRegex
test_cases.description: Tests the regular expression functionality of the CodeValidator, ensuring that strings matching the regex are validated correctly.

test_cases.name: testValidator294Part1
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the CodeValidator when handling null input with specific min/max length constraints.

test_cases.name: testValidator294Part2
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the CodeValidator when handling null input with specific min/max length constraints.
